Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: She received a second cycle of nelarabine without additional IT prophylaxis one month later .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Nelarabine IT prophylaxis |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions "nelarabine IT prophylaxis," which refers to intrathecal (IT) administration of nelarabine as a preventative measure against a disease or complication. Therefore, "nelarabine IT prophylaxis" is the disease entity in this context.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Nelarabine IT prophylaxis |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions "nelarabine IT prophylaxis," which refers to the use of nelarabine as a preventative measure against a disease or complication through intrathecal administration. Therefore, "nelarabine IT prophylaxis" is the only valid disease entity in this context. Other entities such as "one month later," "she received a second cycle," and "without additional IT prophylaxis" do not clearly refer to diseases.
